top.title: US immigration agent fatally shoots woman in Minneapolis

top.title: US seizes two 'shadow fleet' tankers linked to Venezuelan oil

top.title: Trump to meet Colombian president at White House in 'near future'
top.summary: The US president described a call with Gustavo Petro as a "Great Honor", just days after saying a military operation in Colombia "sounds good".

top.title: Government demands Musk's X deals with 'appalling' Grok AI deepfakes
